body.p: Entering the slideshow view starts a slideshow of the images of the current collection with filtering rules and sort order applied. To learn more on how to define the collection, the filtering and the sort order see Collect imagesand Filtering and sort order.

The image display is optimized to take full advantage of your screen size. You should therefore put darktable into fullscreen mode which is toggled by pressing F11. You may press Tabkey in order to hide all remaining panels â€“ namely the filtering option in the top panel.
